actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: Joint resolution to designate a National Day of Atonement.

summary.text: Designates a "National Day of Atonement". Requests the President to issue a proclamation calling upon the people of the United States to observe such day as a day of prayer, humility, and repentence.

titles.title: Joint resolution to designate a National Day of Atonement.
